description: Two multiple-choice tests (weeks 5 and 9) assessing threshold topics from online lessons. Requires 15/20 threshold mark with resit opportunities. Tests cover topics 1-4 (test 1) and 1-8 (test 2).

8 weekly multiple-choice quizzes (10 questions each) corresponding to threshold learning outcomes. Requires 10/10 score within 2 weeks with unlimited attempts. Each passed quiz contributes 1% to final mark.

2hr 10min exam during university examination period covering mastery topics through MCQs, short numerical and answer responses. Optional professional workshop marks can replace lowest exam questions (up to 8%).

Weekly practical assessments split into core skills (10% hurdle requirement) and non-core skills (10% graded questions). Requires 6/8 class attendance and safety compliance. Includes equipment handling and data analysis.
